name: Hostersi
description:
We specialize in IT services such as server solutions architecting, cloud computing implementation, DevOps and servers management. We help to increase the data security and operational capacities of our customers.
 
We are Amazon Web Services Advanced Consulting Partner and Channel Partner. In 2019 Hostersi were included in report "Top 15+ Cloud Computing Consultants in Poland". In 2018 Clutch indicated us as one of the most reliable Polish IT companies, placing us in the "Top B2B Companies in Poland" ranking.
 
Our team of Admins and DevOps works in 100% stationary,  which enables immediate reactions (up to 15 minutes). We work 24/7/365. We have in our team the first Polish AWS Hero and AWS Authorized Instructor Champion.
Our support significantly reduces time and cost of project implementation. Within several years of our activity, we have gained confidence of companies from almost all sectors and industries.
We work for corporations, banks, advertising agencies, start-ups and public institutions.
We are also members of such prestigious organizations as Information Systems Security Association (ISSA) and Chamber of Digital Economy e-Commerce Poland.
